snippet.title: Pier Pressure Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
"Pier Pressure", the ridiculous sea-themed SHMUP, arrives for Windows, Linux, and OSX on September 25th! Wake up and smell the larceny, the museum under your watch has been burgled! Take off in one of three unique ships and blast your way through sky and sea to retrieve the stolen Power Pearl. Strategically trade health energy for upgrades and subweapons, and recover by wiping out your enemies! Confront the fabulously buff crawfish scientist Tony and undo your mistake; your job is on the line!

Check it out on Steam and add it to your wishlist!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1386160/Pier_Pressure/

Join the discussion on Discord!
https://t.co/26dgTfBWti

Follow us on Twitter and Facebook!
https://twitter.com/Head_cannon
https://www.facebook.com/Headcannon-117031702326433

Press Kit: http://www.headcannon.com/pierpressure-press.html
